Inadequate website design: A poorly designed website may deter potential customers and negatively impact user experience, leading to lower sales.
Slow website loading speed: A slow-loading website can result in high bounce rates and a negative user experience, which may lead to lost sales.
Insufficient customer support: Inadequate customer support can lead to negative reviews, lost sales, and a decline in customer trust.
Difficulty in tracking and analyzing sales data: Without proper sales data analysis, it can be challenging to identify trends, optimize marketing strategies, and make informed business decisions.

Inability to handle high traffic volumes: A sudden influx of traffic may lead to website crashes, slow loading times, and a negative user experience, which can result in lost sales and customer dissatisfaction.
